description.description: A brief description of the exercise
description.example: An exercise targeting the chest and triceps.

muscleType.description: The muscle group targeted by the exercise

executionType.description: Type of execution for the exercise (REPETITION or TIME)

targetResTime.description: Target rest time between sets (in seconds)

videoReference.description: Optional video reference URL for the exercise

userId.description: ID of the user who created the exercise

workoutId.description: ID of the workout this exercise belongs to

logs.description: List of logs related to the exercise

averageRestTime.description: Average rest time between sets (in seconds)

notes.description: Additional notes or observations about the exercise log

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the log was created
Date when the exercise was created

updatedAt.description: Date when the exercise was last updated
